Class Signature

extends Object
    Class for signing the data using TPM

    1.0.0

    Balaji Sridharan

    • Method Detail

      • signData

        public static byte[] signData(tss.Tpm tpm,
                              byte[] dataToSign)
        Signs the data using private key provided by the TPM
        Parameters:
        tpm - the instance of the Tpm
        dataToSign - the byte arrys of the data to be signed
        Returns:
        the signed data using the private key

      • validateSignatureUsingPublicPart

        public static boolean validateSignatureUsingPublicPart(byte[] signature,
                                                       byte[] actualData,
                                                       byte[] publicPart)
        Validates the signed data using public part
        Parameters:
        signature - the signature provided by the Tpm
        actualData - the actual data to be validated. The actual data has be be without encoding
        publicPart - the public part of the key used for signing the data
        Returns:
        the status of signature

        Returns:
